item.title: Australia swelters in a record heat wave as temperatures near 50 C
item.description: Parts of Australia have sweltered in record temperatures close to 50 degrees Celsius or 122 Fahrenheit during a prolonged heat wave

item.title: WATCH: Hotel roof collapses to lobby outside of Oklahoma City
item.description: Workers at the hotel say the collapse did not impact the rest of the hotel and no one was hurt.
